direct_answer.text: Firstly we know that harriet’s current age=21 . so zacks_current_age would equal 2*Harriets Age or (2*21)=42 , adrings_current_age=(3*harriets)or(3*21)=63 ; sum up all their ages right now((63)+(42)+(21))/(3) which equals ((126)/3);so,(126/3)answers (42).
